alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 23 at 10:02AM EST until December 23 at 10:52PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Gray has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Souhegan River At Milford affecting Hillsborough County. For the Soughegan River...including Milford, Merrimack...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Souhegan River at Milford. * WHEN...From this morning to late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 9.5 feet, Water begins to flood a portion of Route 101A in Milford. Water begins to flood the property of the Milford water utilites department, properties on Intervale Road in Wilton, and the Monadnock Water parking lot. At 10.0 feet, Floodwaters inundate a portion of Route 101A in Milford and spread into property of the Milford water utilities department and Granite Town Plaza. Floodwaters encroach on low lying properties in Wilton including some on Intervale Road and Monadnock Water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM EST Friday the stage was 8.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.9 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
